message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $11,500. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but I can't go as low as $10,500. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $10,750? I'm really interested in this product and want to make a deal.
